Package starwars.entities

Class LightSaber

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity
      • starwars.SWEntity
        • starwars.entities.LightSaber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface

    public class LightSaber
extends SWEntity
    An extremely powerful, indestructible weapon that implements the Weapon capability It does not take damage with use. This class does not implement all of the abilities shown in the films; there is no capacity for using it to play cover drives with Blaster bolts, or parry other lightsabers; there are also no restrictions on who wields it.
    Author:
    Robert

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightSaber

        public LightSaber​(MessageRenderer m)
        Constructor for the LightSaber class. This constructor will,
        • Initialize the message renderer for the LightSaber
        • Set the short description of this LightSaber>
        • Set the long description of this LightSaber
        • Add a Take affordance to this LightSaber so it can be taken
        Parameters:
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
